import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import iphoneCategoryImage from"../../images/product_1.png";import macCategoryImage from"../../images/product_2.png";import ipadCategoryImage from"../../images/product_3.png";import watchCategoryImage from"../../images/product_4.png";import airpodsCategoryImage from"../../images/product_5.png";import styles from"./Categories.module.css";// Render các category ngoài home page
